20101207170457.250|20101207170458.500|CCO|1977 AND HAD FOUR CHILDREN.

20101207170459.750|20101207170501.000|CCO|THIS YEAR AFTER HE ADMITTED,

20101207170506.000|20101207170507.667|CCO|RUN FOR THE WHITE HOUSE.

20101207170509.333|20101207170511.000|CCO|LOOKING INTO PAYMENTS HUNTER

20101207170547.667|20101207170549.333|CCO|UNEMPLOYMENT BENEFITS FOR 
20101207170549.333|20101207170551.000|CCO|ANOTHER 13 MONTHS, ALSO IN THE 
20101207170551.000|20101207170553.500|CCO|DEAL A PAYROLL TAX HOLIDAY.

20101207170556.000|20101207170558.500|CCO|SOCIAL SECURITY TAXES NEXT YEAR.
20101207170558.500|20101207170601.000|CCO|IF YOU MAKE $60,000, THAT MEANS

20101207170602.250|20101207170603.500|CCO|PAYCHECK.

20101207174335.077|20101207174335.846|CCO|      improve lung function.
20101207174335.846|20101207174336.615|CCO|  While nothing can reverse COPD,

20101207174344.667|20101207174345.333|CCO|        
20101207174345.333|20101207174346.000|CCO|        working together
20101207174346.000|20101207174346.667|CCO|
20101207174346.667|20101207174347.333|CCO|      to help you breathe better.
20101207174347.333|20101207174348.000|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101207174348.000|20101207174348.667|CCO|
20101207174348.667|20101207174349.333|CCO|    inhalers for sudden symptoms

20101207174351.333|20101207174352.000|CCO|      used more than twice a day.
20101207174352.000|20101207174352.667|CCO|  People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101207174352.667|20101207174353.333|CCO|
